name: bridgehub
description: This template provides a minimal setup to get React working in Vite with HMR and some ESLint rules.

scripts.start: npx concurrently "npm run start:api" "npm run start:socket" "npm run start:front" "npm run start:admin-front"
scripts.dev: npx concurrently -n api,socket,rtc,front,admin -c blue,magenta,cyan,yellow,green "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:socket" "npm run dev:rtc" "npm run dev:front" "npm run dev:admin-front"
scripts.dev:front: cd front-server && npx cross-env PORT=7000 npm run dev
scripts.dev:admin-front: cd front-admin && npx cross-env PORT=7700 npm run dev
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:socket && npm run install:rtc && npm run install:front && npm run install:admin-front
scripts.clean: npx rimraf node_modules socket-server/node_modules socket-server/rtc-socket/node_modules front-server/node_modules front-admin/node_modules
scripts.clean:install: npm run clean && npm run install:all
